ComicInfo.Summary:
Fire from Heaven: Chapter 7. Cameos by Stormwatch and Deathblow. Story by Alan Moore. Art by Travis Charest, Ryan Benjamin, JD, and Rich Friend. The original WildC.A.T.s have returned from Khera disillusioned and on the verge of dissolution. Voodoo leaves the team. And, Grifter reunites with the members of Team 7 for one final assault on Gamorra Island.
Story continued from Sigma #2.
Story continues in Deathblow #27.
The original WildC.A.T.s arrive in time to assist Savant's team in their crime war, but many of them have decided to leave the team instead. Lord Emp and Voodoo go off on their own. Grifter arrives to see his old team, but leaves immediately to handle some business in Gamorra Island involving his old team, Team 7. When Zealot hears that Grifter has left to Gamorra Island, she gathers the old team and goes after him. Savant's team fights in the middle of the streets against the crime collective, and the war gets out of hand.
ComicInfo.Title: Fire From Heaven: Chapter 7
ComicInfo.StoryArc: "WildC.A.T.s: Covert Action Teams" Gang War,Fire from Heaven
